Charts

  • Area Plot

Functions

  • title!
  • toolbox!

Area Plot

Function Keywords

x::AbstractVector
y::AbstractArray
fill::Union{Bool, AbstractVector} = true
kwargs...(modifies top-level `EChart` fields)

Single Series

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
areaplot(x, y)

Multiple Series (Overlaid, Not Stacked)

using ECharts
x = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]
y = [11, 11, 15, 13, 12, 13, 10]
y2 = 3.7 .* y
areaplot(x, hcat(y, y2))
